import React from 'react' import {Unit} from "./UnitSelector/Unit" import {UnitSelector} from "./UnitSelector/UnitSelector" export const Defender = ({unit, setUnit, units}) => { const baseShields = units?.find(unit2 => unit?.name === unit2.name)?.base.shields const baseHealth = units?.find(unit2 => unit?.name === unit2.name)?.base.health return {unit?
{baseShields ? <>
🧊
{unit.base.shields} / {baseShields}
: null}
Base {unit.base.armor} 🛡
{setUnit({...unit, base:{...unit.base, shields: 10}}); console.log(unit)}}>aoeu
♥️
<>{unit.base.health} / {baseHealth}
: null} }
